titles.title: Fix the Footnotes Act of 2015
To make technical amendments to title 18 of the United States Code based on the Law Revision Counsel's footnotes in that title.
Fix the Footnotes Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations.
Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

committee.subcommittee: Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary:
Fix the Footnotes Act of 2015
This bill amends the federal criminal code to make technical corrections, including grammar, and other corrections.
